name: The Brother Oingo
startIntroPart1: Long life Brother Oingo, a plan executor of the soon-to-be famous Oingo-Boingo Brothers.
startIntroPart2: O' fearless Oingo, times come to you once more to ruin The Stardust Crusaders plans! Will you make Oing-Boingo Brothers the best assassin duo? Can you build a brotherhood that will stand the test of time?
declaringWar: Time to host a show! And you are a perfect tragedy!
attacked: Do you really know who I am, fool?
introduction: Hello. I am Oingo, my card is the God of creation Khnum!
afterPeace: Well, no word from lil bro anyway.
tradeRequest: Your goods seems good, why don't we help each other?
uniques: [-10]% Strength <for [Land] units> <when fighting in [Enemy Land] tiles>
[+10]% Strength <for [Land] units> <when fighting in [Friendly Land] tiles>

name: The Brother Boingo
startIntroPart1: Long life Brother Boingo, a plan maker of the soon-to-be famous Oingo-Boingo Brothers. A shy yet pshycotic junky.
startIntroPart2: O' cunning Boingo, times come to you once more to ruin The Stardust Crusaders plans! Will you make Oing-Boingo Brothers the best assassin duo? Can you build a brotherhood that will stand the test of time?
declaringWar: Toth just saw your future destruction!
attacked: HAH! I can predict your downfall!
introduction: Hello. I am Boingo, my card is the God of knowledge Thoth!
tradeRequest: Your goods seems good, why don't we help each other?
